summary.para: OLE calls this method when the user drags the mouse cursor into a potential drop target window.

param.name: hwndTarget
param.para: The window handle of the potential drop target window.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success.

summary.para: OLE calls this method when the user drags the mouse cursor out of a potential drop target window.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success.

summary.para: The IDropSourceNotify interface is implemented on an object to receive notifications from OLE when a user drags the mouse into or out of a potential drop target window.
